score-calculator.title: Score Calculator
score-calculator.subtitle: Calculate your submission score based on test results and criteria evaluation
score-calculator.sum_criterion_score_description: Total sum of all criteria scores
score-calculator.fill_form_realtime: Fill in the form to see your results updated in real-time
score-calculator.rule_1: Each submission can score up to 10 points
score-calculator.rule_2: If both tests and criteria are present, each contributes 50% to the final score
score-calculator.rule_3: If only tests exist, they contribute 100% of the final score
score-calculator.rule_4: If only criteria exist, they contribute 100% of the final score
score-calculator.rule_5: Each criterion is scored on a scale of 0-10

nova-apology-modal.title: Important Notice to NEO League Competition Participants
nova-apology-modal.description: The Nova development team wishes to address recent technical issues affecting the competition.
nova-apology-modal.apology_message: We sincerely apologize to all Nova platform users and contestants in the NEO League competition. Our team is working diligently to resolve the following identified issues:
nova-apology-modal.ai_scoring_description: The scoring system is currently misconfigured and will result in giving most users a score of 0. We have identified the root cause and are implementing a fix.
nova-apology-modal.leaderboard_description: The leaderboard scores are not calculating correctly, affecting the competitive ranking display. Our team has identified the issue and is implementing a comprehensive fix.
nova-apology-modal.testcase_description: Non-admin users are currently unable to save testcases and criteria evaluations. This affects challenge submission validation and scoring.
nova-apology-modal.resolution_message: The Nova development team is working around the clock to resolve these issues before the official start of round 1. We're committed to providing you with the best competition experience possible.
nova-apology-modal.bugs_identified: All critical bugs have been identified and prioritized
nova-apology-modal.ai_fix: Fix for AI scoring system in active development
nova-apology-modal.testcase_fix: Fix for testcase handling in review phase
nova-apology-modal.leaderboard_fix: Leaderboard score calculation fix in progress (ETA: before round 1)
nova-apology-modal.commitment_description: The Nova development team is fully committed to resolving these issues before the competition begins. We appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to deliver the best possible platform for your competitive experience.
nova-apology-modal.step_1: Deploy emergency hotfix for scoring system
nova-apology-modal.step_2: Fix testcase handling for all users
nova-apology-modal.step_4: Ensure all systems are ready before round 1 begins
nova-apology-modal.updates_info: For updates and latest information, visit

education.title: Transform Education with AI
education.description: Empower educators and students with intelligent tools for personalized learning, seamless collaboration, and enhanced educational outcomes.
education.trusted_section_description: Our platform is designed to meet the highest standards of security and privacy, ensuring a safe learning environment for students of all ages.

features.smart_learning_management_desc: AI-powered LMS that adapts to each student's learning style and pace.
features.interactive_classrooms_desc: Engage students with real-time collaboration and virtual classroom tools.
features.progress_tracking_desc: Comprehensive analytics to monitor student performance and engagement.
features.course_creation_desc: Easy-to-use tools for creating and managing educational content.
features.virtual_classrooms_desc: Seamless video conferencing integration for remote learning.
features.ai assessment_desc: Automated grading and personalized feedback powered by AI.

use_cases.K_12_education_desc: Comprehensive tools for primary and secondary education management.
use_cases.higher_education_desc: Advanced features for universities and colleges.
use_cases.professional_training_desc: Corporate training and professional development solutions.

education.bento_grid_description: Access thousands of curated educational resources, textbooks, and multimedia content.

faq.question1: How does the AI-powered learning system work?
faq.answer1: Our AI system analyzes student performance, learning patterns, and engagement levels to create personalized learning paths. It adapts in real-time to provide optimal content delivery and support.
faq.question2: What security measures are in place?
faq.answer2: We implement enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with FERPA and GDPR requirements to ensure student data protection.
faq.question3: Can it integrate with existing systems?
faq.answer3: Yes, our platform offers robust API integration capabilities and supports common education technology standards for seamless integration with existing systems.
faq.question4: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer4: We provide 24/7 technical support, dedicated customer success managers, and comprehensive onboarding assistance. Our team also offers regular training sessions and educational webinars.
faq.answer5: The platform is highly customizable with white-labeling options, custom branding, configurable workflows, and API integrations. You can tailor the learning experience to match your institution's needs.
faq.answer6: Our cloud-based platform works on any modern web browser. For optimal video conferencing, we recommend a stable internet connection and updated devices with camera and microphone capabilities.
faq.question7: How do you handle data backup?
faq.answer7: We maintain automated daily backups with 30-day retention, geo-redundant storage, and disaster recovery protocols. Your data is always safe and accessible.

interactive-demo.title: Interactive AI Demo
interactive-demo.input1: Generate a creative story about a time-traveling scientist.
interactive-demo.response1: Here's a short story about Dr. Elena Chen, a quantum physicist who accidentally discovered time travel while researching particle entanglement...
interactive-demo.input2: Make it more suspenseful and add a plot twist.
interactive-demo.response2: As Dr. Chen stepped through the quantum portal, she realized with horror that each "alternate timeline" she'd visited was actually creating paradoxical copies of herself...

nova.get-started-today-description: Join thousands of prompt engineers who are already creating more effective and efficient AI interactions with Nova.
nova.based-in: Based in Ho Chi Minh City
nova.feature-title: Everything You Need to Excel in Prompt Engineering
nova.feature-title-description: A comprehensive suite of tools designed for modern prompt engineers
nova.advanced-ai-description: Access cutting-edge AI models for powerful prompt engineering
nova.real-time-description: Test your prompts in real-time with instant feedback
nova.collaborative-learning-description: Learn from and share with the community
nova.advanced-controls-description: Fine-tune your prompts with advanced controls
nova.performance-analytics-description: Track and optimize your prompt engineering efforts
nova.AI-assistant-description: Get help from our AI assistant for prompt engineering
nova.learning-subtitle: Master Prompt Engineering Through Structured Learning
nova.why-is-prompt-engineering-description: Prompt engineering is crucial because it directly impacts the quality and usefulness of AI-generated content. Well-crafted prompts can significantly improve the accuracy, relevance, and coherence of AI outputs.
nova.learning-page-subtitle: Follow our comprehensive curriculum to become an expert in crafting effective AI prompts
nova.module-1-description: Learn the basics of prompt engineering and its importance in AI development
nova.what-is-prompt-engineering-description: Prompt engineering is the practice of designing and refining input prompts for AI language models to generate desired outputs. It involves crafting clear, specific, and effective instructions that guide the AI in producing accurate and relevant responses.
nova.module-2-description: Master fundamental strategies for effective prompting
nova.zero-shot-description: Learn the differences between zero-shot and few-shot prompting, and when to use each approach effectively.
nova.chain-of-thought-description: Master the technique of breaking down complex problems into logical steps for better AI responses.
nova.module-3-description: Explore advanced techniques for complex prompt engineering
nova.iterative-refinement-description: Learn how to iteratively improve prompts based on AI outputs for optimal results.
nova.Meta-prompting-description: Discover advanced techniques for using prompts to generate other prompts automatically.
nova.module-4-description: Explore advanced techniques for complex prompt engineering
nova.learning-subtitle-description: Access comprehensive tutorials, guides, and real-world examples to enhance your prompt engineering skills. Learn from industry experts and join a supportive community.
nova.structure-learning-description: Learn from industry experts and join a supportive community.
nova.community-support-description: Learn and grow with fellow prompt engineers
nova.earn-cert-description: Get certified in prompt engineering and showcase your skills
nova.program-objectives-description-1: Democratize Prompt Engineering across all backgrounds
nova.program-objectives-description-2: Develop practical AI skills and problem-solving abilities
nova.program-objectives-description-3: Build a global community of AI innovators
nova.program-objectives-description-4: Foster creative solutions to real-world challenges
nova.program-objectives-description-5: Advance AI literacy and ethical understanding

innovate.title: Innovate
innovate.description: Push the boundaries of what's possible with AI and create groundbreaking prompts.

compete.title: Compete
compete.description: Join the leaderboard and see how your prompt engineering skills stack up against others.

about.title: The People Behind
about.subtitle: Meet the team of organizers, developers, sponsors, and contributors who make the NEO League - Prompt the Future 2025 possible.

event-intro.event-description: The first-ever prompt engineering competition hosted by RMIT SGS Neo Culture Tech club, with technical and platform support from Tuturuuu, a pioneer in AI and smart productivity tools.

features.challengesDesc: Participants tackle real-world AI prompt engineering problems designed by industry experts.
features.skillsDesc: Comprehensive learning resources and mentorship to help participants master prompt engineering.
features.communityDesc: Connect with like-minded AI enthusiasts and industry professionals throughout the competition.

call-to-action.title: Join the Revolution
call-to-action.desc: Be part of the first-ever prompt engineering competition that's shaping the future of AI interaction

prompt-intro.description: The emerging discipline that bridges human creativity with artificial intelligence, unlocking the full potential of AI systems through carefully crafted instructions

cards.language-desc: Prompt engineering is the art of communicating effectively with AI systems, crafting precise instructions that guide models toward desired outputs.
cards.creativity-desc: Combining technical precision with creative thinking to unlock capabilities hidden within AI models, transforming vague ideas into concrete results.
cards.future-work-desc: A critical skill for the AI era, enabling professionals across industries to leverage AI as a powerful tool for innovation and problem-solving.

prompt-impact.title: The Bridge Between Human Intent and AI Capability
prompt-impact.description: As AI systems become increasingly powerful, the ability to direct them effectively becomes crucial. Prompt engineering is the key that unlocks their potential, transforming these sophisticated tools into practical solutions for real-world challenges.

cards.democratize-desc: Making advanced AI accessible to everyone.
cards.precision-desc: Achieving specific, accurate results from general-purpose AI models.
cards.skill-desc: A critical competency for professionals in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

prompt-impact.example-code: Create a detailed plan for a sustainable smart city that integrates AI for resource management

why-now.title: The Perfect Moment
why-now.description: We're at a pivotal moment in AI development. Large language models have reached a level of capability where prompt engineering is no longer just a technical skill—it's a creative discipline with transformative potential across industries.

why-us.title: Pioneering Excellence
why-us.description: The collaboration between RMIT SGS Neo Culture Tech club and Tuturuuu brings together academic rigor and technical innovation. We're uniquely positioned to create a competition that challenges participants while providing the resources they need to excel.

sponsors.subtitle: Organizations supporting the NEO League initiative.

tuturuuu.name: Tuturuuu
tuturuuu.description: Pioneer in AI and smart productivity tools, providing technical and platform support for the Neo League competition. Tuturuuu Nova is revolutionizing how we interact with AI through advanced prompt engineering.

rmit-neo-culture-tech.name: RMIT SGS Neo Culture Tech
rmit-neo-culture-tech.description: Host of the Neo League – Prompt the Future 2025 competition, dedicated to fostering innovation and technical excellence in AI and prompt engineering among students.

rmit-sset.name: RMIT SSET
rmit-sset.description: Partner of the Neo League - Prompt the Future 2025 competition, dedicated to fostering innovation and technical excellence in AI and prompt engineering among students.

aptech.name: Aptech
aptech.description: Sponsor of the Neo League - APTECH has been in Vietnam since 1999, providing reputable education primarily to students, high school learners and has trained over 100,000 international programmers for Vietnam's IT industry.

holistics.name: Holistics
holistics.description: Sponsor of the Neo League - Holistics offers a self-service business intelligence platform to help businesses improve their data capabilities easily, focusing on boosting data team productivity and making insights accessible across the company.

AICT.name: AICT
AICT.description: Sponsor of the Neo League - Prompt the Future 2025 competition, dedicated to fostering innovation and technical excellence in AI and prompt engineering among students.

student-council.name: RMIT Student Council
student-council.description: Partner of the Neo League - RMIT Vietnam Student Council (SC) is the representative of RMIT Vietnam student bodies. SC is the conduit for communication between students and the University. By listening and considering students' concerns, SC aims to increase their education experience, personal welfare, social life and cultural activities.

netcompany.name: Netcompany
netcompany.description: Sponsor of the Neo League - Netcompany is an IT services company specializing in strategic projects that drive digital transformation through digital platforms, core systems, and infrastructure services.

special-thanks.title: Special Thanks
special-thanks.subtitle: Contributors and supporters who helped make NEO League possible.

rmit-university.name: RMIT University
rmit-university.contribution: Academic support and venue hosting for the final competition

volunteer-mentors.name: Volunteer Mentors
volunteer-mentors.contribution: Providing guidance and support to Neo League participants

open-source-community.name: Open Source Community
open-source-community.contribution: Various libraries and tools used in the platform

beta-testers.name: Beta Testers
beta-testers.contribution: Platform testing and feedback before launch

media-partners.name: Media Partners
media-partners.contribution: Coverage and promotion of the Neo League competition

community.title: Community Contributions
community.contribution: We'd like to thank all the community members, volunteers, and participants who have contributed to making NEO League a success. Your passion and dedication drive us forward.

tech-sponsor.title: Powered by
tech-sponsor.intro: The Tuturuuu team has been instrumental in making the Neo League competition a reality. Beyond just providing the Nova platform, Tuturuuu's contributions span across multiple aspects of the competition:

infrastructure.title: Technical Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Developing and maintaining the entire competition platform, including the prompt evaluation system.

resources.title: Educational Resources
resources.description: Developing learning materials and documentation to help participants master prompt engineering.

challenges.title: Challenge Design
challenges.description: Creating technically sound and educationally valuable prompt engineering challenges.

mentorship.title: Mentorship & Support
mentorship.description: Providing technical guidance and mentorship to participants throughout the competition.

quote.text: This competition represents our commitment to advancing prompt engineering as a discipline and empowering the next generation of AI practitioners.
quote.author: The Tuturuuu Team

leaderboard-page.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard-page.description: Compete against the best players around the world. Climb the ranks and claim your spot at the top of the leaderboard!

filter-challenges.specific-challenge-title: Showing leaderboard rankings for this specific challenge

tutorials.title: How to Play
tutorials.step-1: Complete challenges and quests to earn points
tutorials.step-2: Your total points determine your rank on the leaderboard
tutorials.step-3: Compete with others for the top spot and win exclusive rewards

rankings.title: Leaderboard Rankings
rankings.first-join: Be the first to join the competition!

current-challenge-card.title: NEO League Competition
current-challenge-card.description: By default, this leaderboard shows scores from all challenges combined. To view results specifically for Round 2 of the NEO League competition, click the link below.
current-challenge-card.current-challenge-description: You are currently viewing the results for Round 2 of the NEO League competition. The scores shown are specific to this challenge.

challenge.create-challenge: Create a new prompt engineering challenge for users to practice with.

challenge.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this challenge? This action cannot be undone.
challenge.attempt-description: Total number of times a user can attempt this challenge.
challenge.number-of-attempts: Number of times a user can attempt this per day.

details.title: Title
details.title-description: Give your challenge a descriptive title.
details.description-placeholder: Provide a detailed description of the challenge.

judging-criteria.judging-criteria-description: Define how submissions will be evaluated. Each criterion will be scored separately.
judging-criteria.criteria-description-placeholder: Explain how this criteria will be judged (e.g., 'How clear and unambiguous is the prompt?')

security.security-description: Secure your challenge with a password or restrict access to specific users.
security.password-description: Require a password to access this challenge
security.leave-empty: Leave empty to keep current password
security.enter-or-leave-password: Enter a new password or leave empty to keep the current one
security.must-be-6-characters: Password must be at least 6 characters long
security.enable-description: Whether this challenge is currently enabled.

whitelist.whitelist-only-description: Restrict access to only whitelisted users.
whitelist.emails-description: Only these email addresses will have access to the challenge.

duration.duration-description: Set how long participants have to complete the challenge once they start.
duration.duration-display-description: How long users have to complete this challenge once they start it.

schedule.schedule-description: Set when your challenge is available to participants.
schedule.timeline-recommendation-description: For best results, set dates in this order: Preview Date ➝ Open Date ➝ Close Date.
schedule.preview-available-description: When participants can preview this challenge before it starts.

cards.delete-challenge-description: Are you sure you want to delete this challenge? This action cannot be undone.

ws-home.ai_chat_playground_discontinued_p1:
Hi there,

We are sorry to announce that
ws-home.ai_chat_playground_discontinued_p2:
has been temporarily disabled for improvement and further testing. Don't worry! We are working on exciting features to bring you a better experience. Stay tuned for a comeback with more features and functionalities. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Best regards,
Tuturuuu

ws-inventory-batches.description: Batches are used to manage product imports and exports.

ws-inventory-categories.description: Categories are used to group similar inventory products together.

ws-inventory-products.description: Products are used as individual type of item that you have in your inventory and could be used to link with invoices.

ws-inventory-promotions.description: Promotions are used to manage product discounts and promotions.

ws-inventory-suppliers.description: Suppliers are used to link inventory products with their suppliers.

ws-inventory-units.description: Units are used to measure inventory products.

ws-inventory-warehouses.description: Warehouses are used to store inventory products.

ws-invoices.description: Invoices are used to link finance transactions and purchased products with applied promotions from your workspace's inventory.

ws-members.delete-member-description: You can delete this member from the workspace.
ws-members.cannot-delete-last-owner: You cannot delete the last owner of the workspace.
ws-members.update-error: An error occurred while updating the member

ws-models.description: Models are trained AI models that can be used for different tasks.

ws-pipelines.description: Pipelines are used to run programmable workflows.

ws-post-emails.description: Send emails to users that have their work checked by authorized staff in specific user group posts.

ws-product-categories.description: Product categories are used to categorize the products in your workspace.

ws-product-suppliers.description: Product suppliers are used to manage the suppliers of the products in your workspace.

ws-product-units.description: Product units are used to define the units of measurement for the products in your workspace.

ws-product-warehouses.description: Product warehouses are used to manage the storage locations of the products in your workspace.

ws-queues.description: Queues are used to manage tasks and jobs.

ws-quiz-sets.description: Quiz sets are used to group quizzes together for learning purposes.

ws-quizzes.description: Manage quizzes in your workspace that have multiple choice questions for learning purposes.

ws-reports.name: Name

ws-reports.report_score_text: Text displayed for report score header
ws-reports.report_feedback_text: Text displayed for report feedback header

ws-roles.description: Roles are used to manage user permissions in your workspace by creating roles and assigning them to users.
ws-roles.create_description: Create a new role for this workspace.
ws-roles.edit_description: Edit an existing role in this workspace.
ws-roles.name: Name
ws-roles.admin_description: Full access to all features and settings.
ws-roles.view_infrastructure_description: Allows members to view infrastructure statistics and settings.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_secrets_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete workspace secrets.
ws-roles.manage_external_migrations_description: Allows members to view and execute external migrations.
ws-roles.default_permissions_description: These permissions will be applied to all users in your workspace by default.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_roles_description: Allows members to change permissions and assign roles to users.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_members_description: Allows members to invite, remove, and update members.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_invites_description: Allows members to send, revoke, and accept invites.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_settings_description: Allows members to change workspace name and logo.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_security_description: Allows members to manage API keys and delete the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_audit_logs_description: Allows members to view all activities in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_workspace_billing_description: Allows members to view and update billing information.
ws-roles.ai_chat_description: Allows members to interact with artificial intelligence through chat.
ws-roles.ai_lab_description: Allows members to create, edit, and delete custom prompts for artificial intelligence.
ws-roles.manage_calendar_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete events in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_projects_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete projects in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_documents_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete documents in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_drive_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete files in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_users_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete virtual user profiles in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_inventory_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete inventory items in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_finance_description: Allows members to view, create, edit, and delete financial transactions in the workspace.
ws-roles.manage_user_report_templates_description: Allows members to edit user report templates.
ws-roles.send_user_group_post_emails_description: Allows members to send emails to virtual users created in your workspace about specific user group post content.
ws-roles.export_users_data_description: Allows members to export users data in the workspace.
ws-roles.export_finance_data_description: Allows members to export finance data in the workspace.

ws-user-reports.description: User reports are used to track the progress of users in your workspace.

ws-users.description: Users are people who are directly or indirectly related to your workspace. They can be assigned to tasks, projects, and more.

ws-wallets.description: Wallets are used to store and manage the financial activities of your workspace.
